title: Everton Women's striker Chloe Kelly picks up Women's Super League Player of the Month Award
text:
Everton Women's striker Chloe Kelly has been awarded the Women's Super League's Player of the Month for September.

The 21-year-old scored two stunning strikes last month to secure a 2-0 victory over Bristol City.

Kelly also played in their opening day win at Birmingham and her form has helped Everton rise up to fourth in the table.

Everton Women's striker Chloe Kelly won Player of the Month after scoring two in three games

Tottenham coaches Karen Hills and Juan Amoros, meanwhile, have picked up the Manager of the Month award.

The co-managers overcame a narrow opening day loss away at Chelsea to lead their side to two victories against Liverpool and West Ham, which also included two clean sheets.

Hills and Amoros' side sit fifth in the league standings and face newly-promoted Manchester United on Sunday.
description: Everton Women's striker Chloe Kelly has been awarded the Women's Super League's Player of the Month. She scored two stunning strikes in September to secure a 2-0 victory over Bristol City.
